name: The Gold Dribbler 🌟
description:
Do you dream high?

If you do, you are like Carlos. Actually, he dreams low because of spatial geography: he wants to get all the hidden fortune of the earth, deep down in his golden mine. While following his dreams, he obtained success (in terms)! 

But it came at a price.

Now he has to escape this mess, while going deeper and deeper into this cave full of dangers. Dodge all enemies and advance through the levels in this game where skill is everything!

Challenge yourself and have fun in this combination of platformer and bullet hell, where you must survive with dangerous enemies in a tight cave full of obstacles.

#gamedevtvjam
